content.rendered:
A PTA School of Excellence, the Lake Avenue PTA makes our school sparkle. Arts in Action as well as other activities provide students with a variety of engaging before and after school activities. Our PTA generously supports the school with countless hours of volunteerism and financial support.

Visit the Lake Avenue PTA website and be sure to “like” Lake Avenue PTA on Facebook!

Email: lakeavenuepta@gmail.com

PTA Board Members

President: Erin Leary
Vice President: Colleen Grassi
Treasurer: Katherine (Katie)  Hagen
Secretary: Caryn Simone
